Reviews.Title: Nice TV, no good choices for audio
Reviews.Author: Carol4612
Reviews.Content: I chose the Toshiba because of the tiltable stand and the placement of the dvd slot -- left side, and the general quality of the manufacturer.  What I didn't realize when I went for the LED model instead of the LCD, is that this TV has no headphone jack, only an digital optical out.  You would need the GefenTV Digital Audio Decoder to connect additional speakers.  I don't know why Toshiba took the headphone jack out of this model when no one is ever going to use such a small TV with a sound system receiver.  TV manufacturers could also give up on putting the speakers on the back of the TV, since it makes the sound so muffled.  It sounds like a cell phone or something equally not quite there.Beautiful TV, if you could hear it or realistically connect it to anything.

Reviews.Title: The Cost of Getting Good Audio
Reviews.Author: Daniel A. Espina
Reviews.Content: As another reviewer mentioned, this Toshiba LED television does not have a headphone jack. This means that many of our computer speakers or headphones aren't compatible with this model unless you pay for it. Well I paid for it and now have fantastic audio blaring out my TV, but I thought others should know how much it'll cost if they want to do the same thing.What you'd need to buy:1. A Toslink Digital Optical Cable ($5-15)EX.Mediabridge - Toslink Cable - Optical Digital Audio Cable - 6ft"One of these is needed as the Digital Optical Output has replaced the headphone jack."2. Gefen Digital to Audio Decoder ($80-95)GefenTV Digital Audio DecoderThis box converts the digital audio signal into analog. What this means is you plug the Digital Optical Cable in one side of this, and get the Red and White RCA output on the other.3. A RCA Male to 3.5mm Stereo Female Y-Cable ($5-10)EX.Cables To Go - 03182 - 3.5mm Stereo Female to RCA Male Y-CableThis cable has the traditional white and red RCA connection on one end, and a headphone jack input on the other. So you'll plug the Red and White end of the cables into the decoder, and finally have your headphone/speaker input to plug in whatever you want.So that's $90-120 for a crazy headphone jack! The last thing I want you to know is that using this method, you can't control the speaker/headphone volume through the TV. What this means is that if your speakers/headphones don't have a volume nob on them, then you'll only get one medium level of volume with no way of lowering or raising it.----Now that I've gotten past the frustration of getting my Harman Kardon speakers attached, I've got to say that I'm pleased with my purchase. The TV is sharp looking, seems durable, the built in DVD player works great, and playing Xbox 360 on it using a HDMI cable looks unbelievable. I thought 19 inches might be too small, but it's actually a perfect size for my compact den. The audio is poor which is why not having a headphone jack is such a big issue, but its worth stating that the vast majority of these LED television have poor audio, and that the headphone jack is being phased out of most 2011 televisions as well. I'm just glad there was a solution, because now that everything is set up, it's pretty great.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba TV with built in DVD Player
Reviews.Author: John Heinz
Reviews.Content: This Toshiba TV was the perfect birthday present for my wife. She loves it!! Quality all the way. Built in DVD Player is a real space saver.Amazon is a great place to locate hard to find items. Purchase went like clock work. Fair price and no hastle shopping.

Reviews.Title: TV Nice, but DVD Player Not Working
Reviews.Author: Lisa J. Boulden
Reviews.Content: Ordered through Amazon and received TV the last week of July 2011.This TV is set up in my kitchen and used infrequently.  The sleek design is nice.  The picture is great. The sound quality is only 'okay' (a little on the anemic side).Now, here's my problem:  Yesterday, I tried the DVD player for the FIRST TIME.  I know, I should have tested it earlier, but I just assumed that it would work. I've had plenty of Toshiba products in the past that I was really satisfied with.The DVD player DOESN'T work.  :(It loads, processes for a few seconds, then ejects the disc. (I've tried a few different DVD's.)I've had it for 43 days and the limit for returns is 30 days.So, it seems that I'm stuck with a TV with a DVD player that never worked. I could have paid a lot less for a slimmer set without the DVD player (but I really wanted the combo).

Reviews.Title: Toshiba comes through again
Reviews.Author: James LaBundy
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased another brand on recommendation, and had difficulty with the company and FedEx.  Finally, unable to resolve it , Amazon just refunded my money and finished it for me(Another reason I'll always be a returning customer!).  I re-ordered another brand,  one I've always been statisfied with, having purchased laptops and DVR's from them through Amazon.  I bought tht e Toshiba 19" flatscreen tv with built-in DVD player, and was completely satisfied upon arrival.  It came timely, well-packaged, and with all components complete.  It started right up out of the box, was easy to set up, and had quality throughout;  the picture and sound were geat, and everything on it worked---first time!  Best of all, no delays, no "rock and a hard place" between FedEx and TV company, and the process was smooth from order to setup.  As far as Toshiba as a company, I have always been satisfied, both with laptops and DVR's, and now, flatscreens!  Way to go, Toshiba and Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Just What I Was Looking For...
Reviews.Author: Mercedes L. Johnmeyer
Reviews.Content: I am by no means a TV or electronics expert. I just needed a new TV for my 3 year old sons playroom. He had an ancient, heavy box TV in there and I couldn't stand to look at it anymore. I wanted one that had a built-in DVD player so I could take the PS2 out of that room and move it elsewhere. This TV fit the bill.We've had it now for about a month and I love it. At home we use it strictly for DVDs since there's no cable in his playroom, and the picture is beautiful. Sound is just fine and it's a breeze to set up and get working out of the box.We also use this TV in the master bedroom of our RV. This was the first time I had it hooked up to cable and watched regular TV on it. Again...great picture quality. The DVD player is simple to use (my 3 year old operates it himself when we're home), and the screen has adjustable tilt.Overall I am extremely happy with this TV. It's perfect for what I needed and I absolutely recommend this to anyone looking to use it in a similar fashion...as a child's or RV TV that can play DVDs. Anything more than that, I can't comment on.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Lori Idaho "Lori"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for our camp trailer and it really works great.  I'm very happy with the picture quality and when we don't have a TV signal where we are camping the DVD player comes in handy for the kids on a rainy day.  I liked it so much, I just bought a Toshiba 32" for the family room at home.

Reviews.Title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
Reviews.Author: GreyWolfe "The King of El Paso"
Reviews.Content: The audio on this set is worthless. Even turned up to 100% you can't hear this acroos a small bedroom. The tiny speakers are on the back of the set. Incredibly stupid!

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 19SLV411U 19-inch LED HDTV with Build-in DVD
Reviews.Author: M Hyatt
Reviews.Content: The volume was too low.  I had it in my kitchen and if I turned on the water one could not hear the program.  I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Tv fully loaded
Reviews.Author: Cheryl L. Collins "Pastor Cheryl"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this tv as a replacement for older one in my kitchen. So happy with my purchased the price was a real bargain. The color, sound, dvd player excellent!!!! Glad I purchased it!!! Highly recommend. Get yours today, you want be dissapointed!!!

Reviews.Title: Sure enough, 4 days after Amazon warranty expired . . .
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: ... TV/DVD combo stopped working.  Power on and it goes into stand-by (solid red light).  Manual was no help and talking to Toshiba directly required an extra dose of blood pressure meds.  Long story short, I have to pay for shipping and hope that they can repair it.  Also hope they return the DVD movie that is currently stuck in the combo set.Update:  Spent 45 minutes on hold last night with Toshiba.  Disconnected twice with both times never getting an RA# or address to return.  Tonight, on my 4th call with Toshiba (2 hours).  Disconnected 3 times.  Finally got a RA# but when it came to get an address to return, disconnected.  This is my last attempt.  Never, EVER, will I purchase another Toshiba product!!

Reviews.Title: TV/DVD Combo
Reviews.Author: diaone7
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product to allow time to past while on deployment. When I received the product it was prior to the estimated delivery date so I was very excited. When I tried to play a DVD, I found out that the DVD player did not work! I was so angry, so assumed it was the type of DVD so I purchased a DVD from the store for about 38.95 and it still would not play. I could not send back due to me being deployed, I had to purchase an additional dvd player! SUCKS!!

Reviews.Title: Nice Little TV
Reviews.Author: Kathleen G. Brown "KatWoman"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for use in my home office.  It's the perfect size, user friendly and has a great picture.  I can see how one may be disappointed in the audio.  If you're looking for TV sound that booms across a room, this isn't the one for you.  But for my purposes (on the corner of my desk while I'm working), it's just fine.

Reviews.Title: fantastic picture
Reviews.Author: LORRAINE LEWIS
Reviews.Content: wanted a smaller set for the bedroom .This was a great buy and has a great picture.Lots of bang for the buck with the DVD player built in.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Picture
Reviews.Author: Mary Huff
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this TV because of the name and the DVD placement combination.  I am seriously disappointed.  The picture is so pixely I can barely stand watching it.  I have tried the different picture sizes and modes and have not found one to be better than the other.  What a waste of money as far as I am concerned.

Reviews.Title: Underwhelmed.
Reviews.Author: Durt
Reviews.Content: There are a lot of good 19" HDTVs out there - and this isn't one of them. As mentioned by all - the audio is a joke. I just bought a small, cheap power amp & speakers to make up for it - and apparently you still need adapters & cables to accomplish that. So much for space saving. Also - it might be an optical illusion, but the Sony 19" TV in my kitchen looks bigger than this unit. Probably due to having working speakers in the front of the chassis. But the Toshiba really looks small - like laptop computer screen small. Picture is almost painfully sharp - but it does not like motion. Serious pixelation & annoying artifacts during action sequences - perhaps a characteristic of an LED monitor? I bought this for my wife's sewing room, she is somewhat less critical than me and wanted something with an integrated DVD player - and coupled with the hassle & expense of returning a perfectly functioning TV means we're keeping the unit. But I'm not at all pleased with it's picture and the external audio headaches are going to balloon the price of this thing by another $100. Pass. Quickly.

Reviews.Title: sound is terrible
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is fine on the tv but the sound is none adjustable.  You can turn the volume up and down with very little change.  In the morning it seems ok but at night you cannot get enough volume out of the tv to here it 10 ft away.Not reccommended for purchase.

Reviews.Title: Worthless TV
Reviews.Author: Vidal D. Graupera "vgraupera"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife as a Christmas present. First one I received was dead on arrival. Returned to Amazon. Replacement unit stopped working after 30 days. Be prepared to spend lots of time on hold with Toshiba. Still working on returning 2nd unit to them as it failed just after return window at Amazon expired. Avoid this TV. It is only headaches. Wish I had bought something else.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Sound
Reviews.Author: susan anderson
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews commenting on the poor sound system before I purchased the 19" Toshiba television.  I thought to myself, my hearing is good; how bad could it be?  Well, the reviews were correct; the sound is practically inaudible.  Unless you have ears like a bat, don't buy this television.

Reviews.Title: SOUND SYSTEM
Reviews.Author: MRETN
Reviews.Content: EVEN AT FULL BLAST I CAN HARDLY HEAR THIS THING. I DO NOT KNOW HOW TO OVERCOME THIS PROBLEM,BUT I GET THE IMPRESSION THAT IT MIGHT BE EXPENSIVE TO FIX.

Reviews.Title: No Sound
Reviews.Author: Jo B Jones
Reviews.Content: So excited to receive my new 19 inch Toshiba for my bedroom.  It came and I immediately set it up and turned it on.  The picture was OK but there was no sound.  I turned the volume up all the way and sat less than a foot from the screen and still could hardly hear it.  I have had Toshibas in the past and liked them.  I either got a lemon or their quality has really gone down hill.  I doubt if I will buy another Toshiba.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 19 inch TV with DVD
Reviews.Author: Brent A. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Arrived very quickly and easy to set up.  Outstanding picture and didn't notice any of the volume or sound level issues that other reviewers mentioned.  Good price and value!

Reviews.Title: TOSHIBA MAKES the WORST PRODUCTS
Reviews.Author: Lambie's MOM "lnlemonlime"
Reviews.Content: The TOSHIBA combo TV/DVD player, (all sizes)  are the WORST!! I have purchased (3) of them, all under warranty more currently known as a "WORST" BUY!!!! All 3 of these tv/combos, fail miserably in the DVD department. The DVD fails, freezes, holds the DVD and will not release it. I bought the larger sized one, 1st and now have a 24" DVD/tv combo. This one does exactly the same thing as the bigger one.The sound is terrible, the DVD/TV combo is terrible, not worth the $$ the gas to haul it back and forth to return it or the aggravation!!TOSHIBA, requires 2+ weeks to decide whether to repair or not, they do not give a Loaner tv, while they are mucking around  deciding what to do with the crummy one. I was cautioned, not to purchase this combo product, by an electronics salesperson and did not listen to them. This is an awful product, as unreliable as anything...DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT!!

Reviews.Title: TV is great but forget about the built in DVD
Reviews.Author: Sarah M. Estrada "bitchslapping truth"
Reviews.Content: i purchased this item used on amazon, no problems with the delivery, got it fast, used the dvd once , by the second time, the disc was getting stuck, and im pretty sure the previous 5 or 6 ownersof this same TV returned it for the same reason, the selling point (built in DVD) DOES _ NOT WORK, and if if does, it will last you 1 or two months. so get off the couch and just get a regular DVD at walmart. target or whatever.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba nightmare
Reviews.Author: ah
Reviews.Content: It quit working within a month of use.  Called Toshiba and after staying on the phone forever for someone to respond, they wanted us to send it back to them but we have to pay the shipping. They indicated no one in Omaha will service this TV. This got returned to Amazon for replacement so hopefully I can do a better review upon receipt of replacement. No sure if I will ever buy a Toshiba again.

Reviews.Title: As advertised.
Reviews.Author: L. Everhart
Reviews.Content: I had no trouble setting this up, and I'm a 54 year old woman with no expertise in electronics.  (I have a DTV with antennae).  It's actually pretty logical.  It does help to read the directions guys.  Including the one for the TV itself.  It is working very well and was just what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Decent little TV
Reviews.Author: James Ko "Apprentice misanthrope"
Reviews.Content: I bought this model, seeking specifically for the combination of screen size and built-in DVD player, and I'm highly satisfied. It's not perfect, but what is? It could be closer to perfect, however, if Toshiba addressed some minor nits.1. It reverts to a default 4:3 aspect ratio whenever you turn it on, never mind that you've previously chosen a different aspect ratio. Annoying.2. As others have mentioned there's not much audio power, but for my purposes it's not a deal-breaker. It sits on my desk so I don't need it to play loud.3. There is no headphone jack, but... ditto.4. Front panel controls would be nice. Perhaps placed on the base or very skinny buttons placed on the bottom edge of the bezel. Aesthetics dictated the decision to place them on the side, probably, but I wish some TV manufacturer would decide that Function should be placed ahead of Form.5. The TV is smart enough to power up in DVD mode if you press Play on the remote, but it is dumb enough to power up in tuner mode if you press the power button, never mind that the unit was previously turned off in DVD mode.I bought a refurbished model from Amazon and the only flaw I've noticed is a subtle fingerprint on the screen that refuses to come off, though I don't want to scrub too hard. It's not noticeable at all when the unit is on, so no biggie.

Reviews.Title: Average Image Quality / No audio output worth mentioning.
Reviews.Author: S. Schmidt
Reviews.Content: Image: blacks are not so good; sort of cloudy grey in appearance.  My tweaks didn't help much.  But for only a couple hundred, this is not such a big deal.Sound: stinks, as expected.  No realistic way of getting better sound.  There's no way I'm gonna spend more than $50 for an external setup...so I guess I'm outta luck!No matter, I didn't buy this TV for its quality, but for its pricetag.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Flat Panel TV/DVD Combo
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've had the Toshiba 19SLV411U 19-inch TV/DVD combo unit for about 3-4 weeks now, and I'm generally quite pleased with it.  I use it in my at-home office where space is cramped, thus its small form-factor works perfectly, and I love the fact that I don't need to have a separate DVD player or too many cables showing.  Picture quality is very pleasing, better than what I expected from a unit this small/inexpensive and setup was a no-brainer.  If I have any complaint, I think it's that the sound quality has a slight tinny nature to it, but obviously this could be fixed with decent external speakers if I so chose.  All things considered, I'm very pleased with this product, and it looks like Santa might be bringing another one to our house this Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Nice Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: Shannon R. Leslie
Reviews.Content: This TV is good for a kitchen.  The sound is not the best but works for a small area. Some channels were very dark and color settings needed to be adjusted manually.  But overall is a nice addition to my kitchen.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE!
Reviews.Author: MES282
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV as a gift for my daughter's 18th birthday in Dec 2011.  In Sept 2012 the TV quit working, just would not turn on anymore.  After trying the trouble shooting methods available on the product website without success, I proceeded to call for technical support.  First, a recording told me that my product's warranty had expired.  When I finally was able to speak to a Representative, I was told that  the only option available to me was to send the TV to a Toshiba Depot for repair and the warranty would cover the repair expense....They would forward an email with specific instructions on packing and mailing, and that the packing supplies and the shipping fee to mail the TV to the Depot Center for repair were the responsibility of the customer.  In my opinion, any company that has been around as long and is as large as Toshiba that is worth its salt would at least supply a prepaid mailing lable.  I feel I paid $200 for a faulty TV that did not even last a year without going on the blink, and in addition, I am out the cost of shipping it for repair.  When I asked to speak to someone to express my displeasure with the process, I was cut off while on hold...TWICE!!! I know enough to have the set professionally packed and to spring for added shipping insurance, as I am sure they could easily blame a number of problems on the set not being packed properly and I would likely be out the full $200 plus the added expense.  This is the last product I will ever buy from Toshiba.

Reviews.Title: Loved it until is stopped working entirely.
Reviews.Author: Compusurge
Reviews.Content: Got it for x-mas 2011. Easy set up. Performed as I expected it would. In early May is simply would not stay on for more than a few seconds. By May 15 it stopped turning on entirely. If I could give it no stars, that would be my rating. Odd, too, is that I have a Toshiba quite like it in another room that I have had for about 5 yrs. Love it. This one.. what can I say?

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: -P
Reviews.Content: We have it as a kitchen TV.  Nice size.  Sound is sufficient, picture is clear on HDMI,and the DVD/CD works well.  Has standard mounting holes on the back so easy to mount on wall mount.  Not very heavy, I was able to hang it by myself while on a ladder.

Reviews.Title: volumn problem with a great picture
Reviews.Author: Mary H.
Reviews.Content: The original TV we ordered was defective; Amazon was wonderful in making sure it was picked up, a second new TV was delivered within 48 hours assuring  us that we had it for Christmas day - great service!(this was our ONLY gift this year)However, this second set has a volume problem; we have to tune the volume up to 70-90 in order to hear the audio clearly.  I probably should have called and had the set returned for still ANOTHER one but didn't feel up to dealing with the many emails and phone calls.One the good side, the picture quality is great - sharp, clear and colorful.

Reviews.Title: toshiba tv works fine
Reviews.Author: Reid Power
Reviews.Content: T.V. works fine.Picture is good and sound is ok considering speaker size. We mounted it to the wall in our granddaughters room. It's size and weight made it easy.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 19SLV411U TV/DVD Combo
Reviews.Author: Carl
Reviews.Content: Ok......Yes, the sound is a bit tinny, but for our kitchen top tv, it will serve us well enough. The picture is sharp and the controls are easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: ricosuave
Reviews.Content: I needed a small TV/DVD combo for our guest bedroom,already have a larger Toshiba in MBR,so this 19" seemed to be the best choice.Shipped quickly from Amazon,was in great shape,easy to set up and were extremely pleased with it!Mind what some folks say that the sound is not the greatest but for a small room,it fits the bill!It is HD with 720p but picture is still good and DVD's look great.Price from Amazon plus free shipping was great.Just couldn't resist the "order now button".Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture
Reviews.Author: Ryal T. Bird
Reviews.Content: Looks good, works great, Nice picture, excellent deal! Mine was missing the bolts for the pedestal, but it was marked as 'USED' even though it had all original packaging/plastic wrap. No problem, I found the bolts/screws at Home Depot for a couple bucks.

Reviews.Title: Perfect little TV
Reviews.Author: BPerkins
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to put in front of my stationary bicycle in hopes that it would encourage me to use the bike.  So far, it's worked.  It has an great picture, sound is fine.  I haven't tried the dvd player yet - I'd better do that.  The Verizon man hooked it up with no problem.  I'm really pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV/DVD for the price!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl A. Holder
Reviews.Content: I had already purchased a Toshiba HDTV with DVD a few years earlier for my kitchen.  I bought this one to have in my office and it's so nice to be able to watch movies again.  It was a nice product for the price.  Would buy it again! I kind of wish I would have bought the next size up.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: packman54
Reviews.Content: Toshiba is a quality product and its name speaks for itself. The tv has fantastic features for a 19 inch and I am totally amazed at the clarity and color for a small tv.

Reviews.Title: Great Addition for a Kids Room
Reviews.Author: L.W.
Reviews.Content: This television alomg with a wall mount bracket,was purchased for a toddlers bed room. The idea is too keep the tv out of the child's reach while preserving desk top space. This television with it's built in DVD player fits the bill. The picture is good,and it is mounted safely out of the child's reach,and far enough out of the way that the is not viewing it too closely. It was  priced  pretty competivily so  that you don't mind paying  it for a kid's room

Reviews.Title: 19 inch tv
Reviews.Author: paul m killy
Reviews.Content: it was exactly what i wanted and i would recommend it to any one wanting a reliable 19 inch tv with dvd player

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for two years now and I love it. I move a lot so the size is great and the built-in DVD player makes for one less piece of equipment I have to lug around.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 19SLV411U a piece of garbage
Reviews.Author: Mozdzierz
Reviews.Content: This item is a piece of garbage! I purchased two for my camper a year ago and they sat in the box since then. I put one in my daughters room when she moved back in and put all of her household goods in the camper I was going to put them in. The TV lasted five months and now will not go on. When I set out to buy these, there were only a few reviews around and they only mentioned the sound quality. Well, after a year, there are a number of reviews that say these stop working. Moreover, when I looked on the internet for ways to fix it, I found a number of other Toshiba products that stopped working.I recommend that no one buys another Toshiba product again, they are pieces of junk!!!!!!!!!To stop buying their products, is the only way they are going to stop making this junk we are spending our hard earned money on!

Reviews.Title: sound is horrible
Reviews.Author: Alice L. Franks "fanci"
Reviews.Content: get ready to turn this up to 99 to hear it.  I bought a sound bar but i will not even play though it.  very good picture just no sound

Reviews.Title: Audio & DVD player
Reviews.Author: Richard A.
Reviews.Content: Audio is terrible, picture is decent, easy to set-up. Never tried the DVD player untill recently, dosen't work. No longer covered by warranty, my mistake. Do not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Excellant service and followup for the TV
Reviews.Author: George elliot
Reviews.Content: Excellant service and the product is working just fine. I will not hestate in the future to order another product.

Reviews.Title: Product quality
Reviews.Author: Clint Leonard
Reviews.Content: This product was a gift for my daughter for christmas. Last week the unit stopped working I wrote the seller and asked for help. They apologized and said the unit was  out of warranty. After a four month period the unit will not power up and the seller offers no real solution to the problem.

Reviews.Title: Delivered as expected
Reviews.Author: Jackie Beasley "JVB"
Reviews.Content: Glad that I chose Toshiba. The DVD Player is an added bonus and made a great gift for my sister. I paid a little more, but it was ultimately worth it. Amazon made this a smooth,successful and timely transaction during the busy holiday season.

Reviews.Title: perfect under a cabinet in my kitchen.
Reviews.Author: Ronald Fisher
Reviews.Content: The 19" screen is excellent for passively viewing tv while working in 65the kitchen. The quality of the picture is great; and the DVD player is an excellent ancillary feature. The only negative is the audio, which is low quality due to the small size of the speakers....but since it's in my kitchen, I can live with that issue.

Reviews.Title: very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: cbish
Reviews.Content: excellent picture quality and value.  Only negative is the quality of the audio.  Like everyone else if you are planning on using this tv in a loud environment there could be an issue.  In our case the set is being used in a relatively quiet area and this unit works pefectly for us.

Reviews.Title: OPERATIONAL AND SET UP
Reviews.Author: THOMAS J.
Reviews.Content: THIS IA AN EXCELLENT TELEVISION AND DVD PLAYER. WE HAD NO ISSUES WITH THE SET OR OPERATIONS OF THIS PIECE OF EQUIPMENT AND WOULD RECOMMEND ITS PERFORMANCE TO ANOTHER PURCHASER.

Reviews.Title: DIDN'T LAST ONE YEAR!
Reviews.Author: Maria C Santana
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my son Christmas 2011 & it's not working anymore. It did not even last a year. The picture went out but still had sound. I disconnected it and when I turned it on, the sound was gone too & it would shut itself off. The technicians were helpful but the problem was NOT resolved. It is under warranty, but now I have to pay for shipping to get it repaired. Why should I have to pay for a defective product? We also have a JVC & a Sony TV that have NEVER given us any problems and we've had them for many years. I would NOT recommend a Toshiba.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE
Reviews.Author: D. Norman
Reviews.Content: Hardly ever used this tv and the "brain" stopped working!  Because it is a small tv Toshiba will not offer repairs at a local facility and item must be mailed back at owners expense for repair.  I will never buy another Toshiba product...something for you to consider!

Reviews.Title: toshiba review
Reviews.Author: Merimen
Reviews.Content: The product works well most of the time.  It's GETTING IT TO WORK that is sometimes a problem.  When it's first turned on, it shows the picture, but sometimes makes a VERY strange sound.  Almost like crackling or -- well, all I can think of is 2 of some kind of metal rubbing against each other.  When I turn it off and then on again, it's fine.  Otherwise, I like it just fine.

Reviews.Title: very nice screen/picture but strange electrical problems
Reviews.Author: Phatgolfr
Reviews.Content: Very nice picture, we only use it with over the air antenna signals.  The built in dvd player does not always eject the disc.  Have to turn it off and unplug and reboot in order to eject the disc.  Have only had it 70 days, may have to return it before the 90 day warranty is up because i dont see it lasting 5+ years with this issue.

Reviews.Title: Two thumbs down!!
Reviews.Author: Kelly B "native lady"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this 19 inch to use in our camper. After using it just a few times volume went out. Customer service at Toshiba contacted and we tried a reset with no improvement. A few hours later TV/DVD quit working altogether with my DVD stuck in it. It has been returned for repair or replacement.Will update review when unit is returned to me.Update: TV returned after 3 weeks with new motherboard installed. So far no issues with the volume. It is still not has loud as I would like but at least it works and you can hear it in a loud rainstorm.I hope this one last longer then the 6 months for the first one.

Reviews.Title: Broken on the 3rd week
Reviews.Author: Patty
Reviews.Content: I must start off that Amazon has excellent customer service.  This TV/DVD Combo was the first of electronics i bought from Amazon.  The unit stopped working after only watching it a few times. So i cannot recommend this Toshiba 19SLV411U 19-Inch 720p 60 Hz LED HDTV with Built-in DVD Player.  I was plenty surprised since this brand is known for good quality and this could've been just a fluke thing. However, i am incredibly satisfied w/ Amazon's return/exchange policy & their amazing friendly service. (I had to return it with a movie stuck inside the player)but oh well.  I'm sure i can find another TV.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom tv
Reviews.Author: greypassion
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a new tv for the bedroom. Found the Toshiba 19slv411u 19 Inch 720p 60 hz led hdtv with built in dvd player. Love everything about it! Great price too!

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 19SLV411U 19-Inch 720p 60 Hz LED HDTV with Built-in DVD Player, Black Toshiba 19SLV411U 19-Inch 720p 60 Hz LED HDTV with
Reviews.Author: Joan B. Knecht
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a TV/DVD, for my desk area. Priority was finding best product, within my planned price range.  This choice turned out to be perfect.  Very satisfied with this purchase.  It was easy to setup, perfect for my viewing, and I have encountered no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase of a great product.
Reviews.Author: Chester P. Lippy
Reviews.Content: It is always a pleasure dealing with Amazon.com!  items ordered are in great condition, come on or before the time promised.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Does not meet expectations
Reviews.Author: julio modesto
Reviews.Content: I am not satisfied with this purchase. The screen is 18.5 inch instead of 19. The sound is very poor and otherwise, the TV is very small when compared with a 19 ".

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Time
Reviews.Author: Sammy Calabrese
Reviews.Content: Tv works great. I have only had it for a couple weeks but the setup was real easy. The dvd player is real simple to use and the color and sound are just right. This tv is for a spare bedroom and it works perfectly fine. No complaints so far and pretty happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: David McKee
Reviews.Content: Great little TV. Purchasd it for our kitchen and it works great. Wife loves it and we couldn't be happier. Would recomend to anyone needing a small TV.

Reviews.Title: Good and Lightwieght
Reviews.Author: Sam "Sam"
Reviews.Content: The package came without delay.  It was easy to put together, the TV unit is light and easy to move. Good unit for using the DVD.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: Great price on TV, good quality, great device, i got it for my bedroom and its great, looks awesome and it has great quality picture

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: DEBORAH
Reviews.Content: The Toshiba has a great picture. It's simple to use. The built-in DVD player makes it compact. I chose to use the stand and installation was quick and easy.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Ruth
Reviews.Content: The television/dvd arrived promptly.  I really like it and it adds to my kitchen counter and the other black appliances that I have recently purchased.  I would recommend this to anyone who would like the combination.rb

Reviews.Title: NO HEADPHONE JACK
Reviews.Author: Massachusetts Reviewer "Massachusetts Reviewer"
Reviews.Content: Last year I purchased the 15" model of this Toshiba TV-DVD combo thinking that it could be used as a PC monitor if need be (since I already owned the 22" model which CAN be used as a monitor).  But when my monitor broke this morning and I hooked up the 15" one, I discovered that it could NOT be used as a monitor, so I had to hook up the 22" one.  I then went on Amazon to purchase a replacement for the 22" one now being used as a monitor, searched for "tv-dvd-monitor," and the 15" version came up in the results, even though it cannot be used as a monitor!  I kept searching until I could find a clear statement that the model being described could be used as a monitor, which the page of this 19" model definitely did.  So I thought I had found my dream TV-DVD-Monitor until I read the reviews, one of which revealed that the 19" version HAD NO EARPHONE JACK!  Toshiba makes very reliable electronics, but it needs standardize the components of its small TVs--all should be able to be used as monitors, and all should have earphone jacks.  (Now I'm afraid to read any more reviews, lest I discover that some models are missing even more basic things, such as an on-off button.)

Dimension:18.51 x 13.52 x 7.64 Inches (Withstand)
